channel.title: How to change starter gear when first logging in

item.title: How to change starter gear when first logging in
item.dc:creator: @EchoScapePk EchoScapePk
item.description:
@EchoScapePk wrote:

[center]How to change starter gear when first logging in.[/center]
[center]Don’t post bad comments, because this is my first topic, and I never saw a tut on this.[/center]

[center]This is actually fairly easy.[/center]
[center]Open your source folder and click on “player.java”[/center]
[center]Then Search this: // Giving the player an unique look[/center]
[center]You will see a code similar to this:[/center]
[center]// Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat] = 6858; playerEquipment[playerCape] = 14095; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 6585; playerEquipment[playerChest] = 14538; playerEquipment[playerShield] = 6889; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = 2497; playerEquipment[playerHands] = 7462; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 15350; playerEquipment[playerRing] = 6735; playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 4151;[/center]

[center]That is I weed I’s Starting gear he made.[/center]
[center]Just find that code and change the equipment to what you like.[/center]

[center]Thanks guys. :)[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter gear when first logging in
